note.p: Career: Worked in the laboratory of Ambrose Godfrey Hanckewitz (FRS 1730) where he discovered ether (1730)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Printed list; ADB
References: P Fontes da Costa, 'The Culture of Curiosity at The Royal Society in the first half of the eighteenth century', NR 2002 vol l56 pp 147-166
Authority: Altnames from ADB and CB
Notes: Proposed by Sir Hans Sloane, William Rutty, Sir Conrad Joachim Sprengwell. Musgrave gives date of death as 1742-3
